tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek samimiyet insanların kalplerini açarken, suistimal ise kalplerin kapanmasına sebep olur.
tr_quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

tr_quotes.quote: Dürüstlük, en iyi siyasettir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Göründüğün gibi ol, olduğun gibi görün.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Doğruları korumaktan korkmayınız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dürüst insanın hem bedeni hem ruhu rahattır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dürüstlüğün, kurala ihtiyacı yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanların hem içi, hem de dışı temiz olmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Abartma, dürüst insanların yalanıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dürüst olmakla, dürüstü oynamak aynı şey değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yalan bir yıl koşar, doğru onu bir anda geçer.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyada lekesiz bir alından, daha güzel bir şey var mı?
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Büyük olma yolunda ki ilk adım, dürüst olmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Diğerlerine karşı dürüst olmadan, kendine karşı dürüst ol.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dürüst insan her zaman gerçeği söyler, akıllı insan ise yalnız zamanında.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyada dürüst insanı kandırmaktan daha kolay bir şey yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Akıllı, bilgin, zengin olmak zorunda değiliz ama dürüst olmak zorundayız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dürüst insan, incindiği zaman uzaklaşır ve hiçbir şey söylemez.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer dürüst yaşamışsak, nasıl öleceğimizi düşünmemize hiç gerek kalmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Düşünceleriniz yenilse bile, dürüstlüğünüz zafer çığlığı atmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dürüst bir kadının güzelliği ateşe benzer; yaklaşmayana hiçbir zararı dokunmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Doğru insan, söyledikleri ile yaptıkları birbirini tutmamasından utanç duyar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Benim sloganım, konsantrasyondur. Fakat ondan önce, dürüstlük ve üretim gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Doğruluk dışındaki hiçbir düşünceyi, ne kafanızda ne de yüreğinizde yaşatın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dürüst insan kendine hâkim olabilmek için sürekli kendi kendisiyle mücadele halindedir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dürüstlük elmas gibidir, aydınlıkta daha çok parlar ve değeri daha çok belli olur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insan parmağını başkasına uzatınca, üç parmağın da kendisine uzatıldığını unutmamalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dürüst olmak cesaretini gösteren kimse, hiçbir zaman yalan söylemek ihtiyacını duymaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Arzuların seni yanlış yollara yöneltebilir, ona karşı koymayı becerebilirsen mutlu bir hayatın olur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Biri size “dürüst insan” diye bir şey yoktur derse, o kişinin bir düzenbaz olduğuna inanın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Doğruluk tüm erdemlerin temelidir, insanlar doğruluktan şaşmazlarsa etraflarına güneş misali ışık saçarlar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dostlarınızın sizinle olmasını istiyorsanız, siyasi hayatınızda daima doğruluktan yana olun.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Daima dürüst insanların gözü önünde bulunmak istemek, gerçekten dürüst olmak demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dürüstlüğü kanıtlamanın en önemli yollarından biri, o sırada yanınızda olmayan kişilere sadakat göstermektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dürüstlük bir şehirdir, ben de o şehrin sultanıyım, onda kendim yaşayayım, kendim öleyim, kendim korunayım.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yalan zeka işidir, dürüstlük ise cesaret. Eğer zekân yetmiyorsa yalan söylemeye, cesaretini kullan da dürüst olmayı dene.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgili ve akıllı dürüstlük, en iyi siya settir. Kurnazlık politikası ise, cehaletin ve samimiyetsizliğin müşterek malıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Şu dünyada hiç dürüstlük yok muydu?
tr_quotes.author: Jack London

tr_quotes.quote: Dürüstlük dünyaya bedeldir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bilimi süsleyen doğruluktur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer dürüstsen zarar görmezsin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dürüstlük, her derdin devasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Doğruları konuşmaktan korkmayınız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İyi ama dürüst olmayandan uzak dur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir yalan bin doğruyu yok edebilir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Abartma, dürüst insanların yalanıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ey dürüstlük, bana doğru yolu göster.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Doğru ırmak, eğri yataklar içinden akar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Akıl bir ağaç, dürüstlük ise meyvesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın araması gereken ilk şey dürüstlüktür.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir miras doğruluk kadar zengin değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bence bir ilişkide en önemli şey dürüstlüktür.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hesabı temiz olanın muhasebeden korkusu olmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Büyük olma yolunda ki ilk adım, dürüst olmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dürüstlük; hiçbir zaman adaletten ayrılmamaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Doğruluk, sonsuzluğun güneşidir; nasıl olsa doğar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dürüst olmak, hayatınızdan yanlış olanları temizler.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçekten dürüstlük istiyorsan, ilk önce kendinden başla.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyada dürüst insanı kandırmaktan daha kolay bir şey yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dürüst insan, incindiği zaman uzaklaşır ve hiçbir şey söylemez.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Samimiyetin belirtisi gözler, dürüstlüğün ifadesi de tutulan sözlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dürüstlük; haksızlık yapana yanlış yaptığını uygun bir şekilde söyleyebilmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dürüstlük kişinin bildiğini söylemekle. İşine geleni söylemek, arasında yaptığı seçime dayanan bir ahlak sorunudur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dürüstlük ve sadakat önemlidir. İki kişi birbirleriyle her şey hakkında dürüst olabiliyorsa, bu muhtemelen başarının en büyük anahtarıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ben sadece dürüstüm, söylediklerim hakkında endişelenmemeyi seviyorum. Gerçekten yapmacık olmak için ne zamanım ne de enerjim var ve bu şekilde yaşamak istemiyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: Trust is hard to come by. That's why my circle is small and tight. I'm kind of funny about making new friends
en_quotes.author: Eminem

en_quotes.quote: If people like you, they'll listen to you, but if they trust you, they'll do business with you
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: Never trust anyone who doesn't drink coffee
en_quotes.author: AJ Lee

en_quotes.quote: Trust in dreams, for in them is hidden the gate to eternity
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: There are ups and downs, but whatever happens, you have to trust and believe in yourself
en_quotes.author: Luka Modric

en_quotes.quote: Do not let your hearts be troubled. Trust in God; trust also in me
en_quotes.author: Jesus Christ

en_quotes.quote: Old wood best to burn, old wine to drink, old friends to trust, and old authors to read
en_quotes.author: Athenaeus

en_quotes.quote: As you enter positions of trust and power, dream a little before you think
en_quotes.author: Toni Morrison

en_quotes.quote: The trust of the innocent is the liar's most useful tool
en_quotes.author: Stephen King

en_quotes.quote: Never trust anything that can think for itself if you can't see where it keeps its brain
en_quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

en_quotes.quote: I trust in nature for the stable laws of beauty and utility. Spring shall plant and autumn garner to the end of time
en_quotes.author: Robert Browning

en_quotes.quote: The single most important ingredient in the recipe for success is transparency because transparency builds trust
en_quotes.author: Denise Morrison

en_quotes.quote: Hope is trust in God's promises, faith that if we act now, the desired blessings will be fulfilled in the future
en_quotes.author: James E. Faust

en_quotes.quote: I don't really trust nobody
en_quotes.author: YoungBoy Never Broke Again

en_quotes.quote: We have a great country, we are a great nation - let us trust in it
en_quotes.author: Felipe VI of Spain

en_quotes.quote: The love of a dog is a pure thing. He gives you a trust which is total. You must not betray it
en_quotes.author: Michel Houellebecq

en_quotes.quote: We must weed out corruption and build a strong system of justice that the people can trust
en_quotes.author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo

en_quotes.quote: The senses deceive from time to time, and it is prudent never to trust wholly those who have deceived us even once
en_quotes.author: Rene Descartes

en_quotes.quote: Mature love is composed and sustaining; a celebration of commitment, companionship, and trust
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Trust your gut. You know yourself, so don't let somebody else tell you who you are
en_quotes.author: Tatiana Maslany

en_quotes.quote: It makes it so much easier to work with people who you can implicitly trust
en_quotes.author: Ileana D'Cruz

en_quotes.quote: Trust me, sunscreen is so, so, so important and so I always wear sunscreen, but I still get really tan
en_quotes.author: Lea Michele

en_quotes.quote: The more you trust your intuition, the more empowered you become, the stronger you become, and the happier you become
en_quotes.author: Gisele Bundchen

en_quotes.quote: Never trust a man, who when left alone with a tea cosey... Doesn't try it on
en_quotes.author: Billy Connolly

en_quotes.quote: Never trust anyone completely but God. Love people, but put your full trust only in God
en_quotes.author: Lawrence Welk

en_quotes.quote: You may be deceived if you trust too much, but you will live in torment if you don't trust enough
en_quotes.author: Frank Crane

en_quotes.quote: I'm a dirt person. I trust the dirt. I don't trust diamonds and gold
en_quotes.author: Eartha Kitt

en_quotes.quote: To be trusted is a greater compliment than being loved
en_quotes.author: George MacDonald

en_quotes.quote: Every sale has five basic obstacles: no need, no money, no hurry, no desire, no trust
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: My favorite six words in recovery are: trust God, clean house, and help others
en_quotes.author: Matthew Perry

en_quotes.quote: It's no fun being a loser. Trust me
en_quotes.author: Mickey Rourke

en_quotes.quote: We believe that transparency creates trust
en_quotes.author: Julie Sweet

en_quotes.quote: Trust has to be earned, and should come only after the passage of time
en_quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

en_quotes.quote: When the norm is decency, other virtues can thrive: integrity, honesty, compassion, kindness, and trust
en_quotes.author: Raja Krishnamoorthi

en_quotes.quote: Brands are all about trust. That trust is built in drops and lost in buckets
en_quotes.author: Kevin Plank

en_quotes.quote: Trust is that rare and priceless treasure that wins us the affection of our heavenly Father
en_quotes.author: Brennan Manning

en_quotes.quote: Trust men and they will be true to you; treat them greatly and they will show themselves great
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Trust your landmark and run through the smoke. It's going to open up eventually
en_quotes.author: Ezekiel Elliott

en_quotes.quote: Trust your own instinct. Your mistakes might as well be your own, instead of someone else's
en_quotes.author: Billy Wilder

en_quotes.quote: You desire that which exceeds my humble powers, but I trust in the compassion and mercy of the All-powerful God
en_quotes.author: Saint Stephen

en_quotes.quote: The blockchain does one thing: It replaces third-party trust with mathematical proof that something happened
en_quotes.author: Adam Draper

en_quotes.quote: As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: We believe that transparency is needed to create trust, and it's also needed to create a dialogue
en_quotes.author: Julie Sweet

en_quotes.quote: Someone that you obviously can trust and someone that you would trust your life with - that's a really good friend
en_quotes.author: Ron Hall

en_quotes.quote: Trust me: it's cool to invest
en_quotes.author: Juice Wrld

en_quotes.quote: The crown must constantly earn citizens' appreciation, respect and trust
en_quotes.author: Felipe VI of Spain

en_quotes.quote: Quakers almost as good as colored. They call themselves friends and you can trust them every time
en_quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

en_quotes.quote: Faith is a state of openness or trust
en_quotes.author: Alan Watts

en_quotes.quote: Trusting your individual uniqueness challenges you to lay yourself open
en_quotes.author: James Broughton

en_quotes.quote: As time goes by, I realize that I do trust the wind. And I often write my songs for myself
en_quotes.author: David Friedman

en_quotes.quote: Put more trust in nobility of character than in an oath
en_quotes.author: Solon

en_quotes.quote: The secret of a long life is to never trust a doctor
en_quotes.author: Luise Rainer

en_quotes.quote: Do not trust all men, but trust men of worth; the former course is silly, the latter a mark of prudence
en_quotes.author: Democritus

en_quotes.quote: Trust, but verify
en_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

en_quotes.quote: When a man assumes a public trust he should consider himself a public property
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: I cannot trust a man to control others who cannot control himself
en_quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

en_quotes.quote: If you don't trust the pilot, don't go
en_quotes.author: Denzel Washington

en_quotes.quote: Faith is trust in ultimate meaning
en_quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

en_quotes.quote: Trust is not the same as faith. A friend is someone you trust. Putting faith in anyone is a mistake
en_quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

en_quotes.quote: Trust in what you love, continue to do it, and it will take you where you need to go
en_quotes.author: Natalie Goldberg

en_quotes.quote: The future which we hold in trust for our own children will be shaped by our fairness to other people's children
en_quotes.author: Marian Wright Edelman

en_quotes.quote: Transparency is not about restoring trust in institutions. Transparency is the politics of managing mistrust
en_quotes.author: Ivan Krastev

en_quotes.quote: Most good relationships are built on mutual trust and respect
en_quotes.author: Mona Sutphen

en_quotes.quote: The maid that loves goes out to sea upon a shattered plank, and puts her trust in miracles for safety
en_quotes.author: Edward Young

en_quotes.quote: I never trust a fighting man who doesnt smoke or drink
en_quotes.author: William Halsey

en_quotes.quote: In capital we trust. Capital is our savior, our holy grail, our fountain of youth, or at least health, for banks
en_quotes.author: Bethany McLean

en_quotes.quote: Men are able to trust one another, knowing the exact degree of dishonesty they are entitled to expect
en_quotes.author: Stephen Leacock

en_quotes.quote: Never trust a computer you can't throw out a window
en_quotes.author: Steve Wozniak

en_quotes.quote: My father always said, 'Never trust anyone whose TV is bigger than their book shelf' - so I make sure I read
en_quotes.author: Emilia Clarke

en_quotes.quote: Trust your passion. Believe in your dream
en_quotes.author: Satoru Iwata

en_quotes.quote: Airbnb has proven that hospitality, generosity, and the simple act of trust between strangers can go a long way
en_quotes.author: Joe Gebbia

en_quotes.quote: It is better to suffer wrong than to do it, and happier to be sometimes cheated than not to trust
en_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: When I get logical, and I don't trust my instincts - that's when I get in trouble
en_quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

en_quotes.quote: Choose your friends wisely, and also choose friends that you can trust
en_quotes.author: Elyn Saks

en_quotes.quote: Therefore trust to thy heart, and to what the world calls illusions
en_quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

en_quotes.quote: What we learn only through the ears makes less impression upon our minds than what is presented to the trustworthy eye
en_quotes.author: Horace

en_quotes.quote: You can't trust water: Even a straight stick turns crooked in it
en_quotes.author: W. C. Fields

en_quotes.quote: You have to empower your employees to make their own choices and trust that they will make the right choices
en_quotes.author: Dara Khosrowshahi

en_quotes.quote: I have trust issues. For reasons, though - plenty of reasons
en_quotes.author: YG

en_quotes.quote: What is it that makes us trust our judges? Their independence in office and manner of appointment
en_quotes.author: John Marshall

en_quotes.quote: We must trust our own thinking. Trust where we're going. And get the job done
en_quotes.author: Wilma Mankiller

en_quotes.quote: To persevere, trusting in what hopes he has, is courage in a man
en_quotes.author: Euripides

en_quotes.quote: I fully trust Abbas-Mustan. We have worked together in the past, so I have full faith in them
en_quotes.author: Amisha Patel

en_quotes.quote: Ruthless trust ultimately comes down to this: faith in the person of Jesus and hope in his promise
en_quotes.author: Brennan Manning

en_quotes.quote: Trust funds can never be a substitute for a fund of trust
en_quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

en_quotes.quote: Your every voter, as surely as your chief magistrate, exercises a public trust
en_quotes.author: Grover Cleveland

en_quotes.quote: It starts with trusting yourself, even if people are telling you you're too young to trust yourself
en_quotes.author: SZA

en_quotes.quote: Whoever has trusted a woman has trusted deceivers
en_quotes.author: Hesiod

en_quotes.quote: In America few people will trust you unless you are irreverent
en_quotes.author: Norman Mailer

en_quotes.quote: If you trust in an idea of football, and you trust in the team, it's important to have a squad with good balance
en_quotes.author: Antonio Conte

en_quotes.quote: I want to be strong because you believe in me. You have to trust me. I give my knowledge to you. That is my philosophy
en_quotes.author: Claudio Ranieri

en_quotes.quote: Our neighborhoods are safer when there is trust between communities and the police who are in charge of protecting them
en_quotes.author: Pete Buttigieg

en_quotes.quote: I literally forget everything, and, trust me, that's the best thing that you can have
en_quotes.author: Hina Khan

en_quotes.quote: There's nobody to believe in anymore, nobody to trust
en_quotes.author: Alan King

en_quotes.quote: When I feel that people trust me, I'm prepared to do everything
en_quotes.author: Marouane Fellaini

en_quotes.quote: The harder I train every day on the track and in the gym, the more trust I gain in myself
en_quotes.author: Miguel Cotto

en_quotes.quote: Liberalism is trust of the people tempered by prudence. Conservatism is distrust of the people tempered by fear
en_quotes.author: William E. Gladstone

en_quotes.quote: Let no such man be trusted
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: Let every eye negotiate for itself and trust no agent
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: Trust your instinct to the end, though you can render no reason
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: I trust no one, not even myself
en_quotes.author: Joseph Stalin

en_quotes.quote: He who does not trust enough, Will not be trusted
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: Childlike surrender and trust, I believe, is the defining spirit of authentic discipleship
en_quotes.author: Brennan Manning

en_quotes.quote: All of my favorite people - people I really trust - none of them were cool in their younger years
en_quotes.author: Taylor Swift

en_quotes.quote: I have no fear that the result of our experiment will be that men may be trusted to govern themselves without a master
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: Trust me: Every entrepreneur has felt like an utter loser at some point
en_quotes.author: Caroline Ghosn

en_quotes.quote: Never trust the advice of a man in difficulties
en_quotes.author: Aesop

en_quotes.quote: When the people we love stop paying attention, trust begins to slip away and hurt starts seeping in
en_quotes.author: Brene Brown

en_quotes.quote: Few things can help an individual more than to place responsibility on him, and to let him know that you trust him
en_quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

en_quotes.quote: The most special relationships, in my experience, are based on a combination of trust and mutual respect
en_quotes.author: Charles Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Seize the day, and put the least possible trust in tomorrow
en_quotes.author: Horace

en_quotes.quote: Trust is built with consistency
en_quotes.author: Lincoln Chafee

en_quotes.quote: Keep the faith, don't lose your perseverance and always trust your gut extinct
en_quotes.author: Paula Abdul

en_quotes.quote: Trust the Canadians to produce a game about mutual funds that is actually more boring than the real thing
en_quotes.author: Alex Berenson

en_quotes.quote: Do not trust your memory; it is a net full of holes; the most beautiful prizes slip through it
en_quotes.author: Georges Duhamel

en_quotes.quote: The only kind of seafood I trust is the fish stick, a totally featureless fish that doesn't have eyeballs or fins
en_quotes.author: Dave Barry

en_quotes.quote: I can count on one hand how many people I trust
en_quotes.author: Frances Bean Cobain

en_quotes.quote: I never thought I was gullible, but I know that I trust people easily and take people on face value
en_quotes.author: Taapsee Pannu

en_quotes.quote: It's good to trust others but, not to do so is much better
en_quotes.author: Benito Mussolini

en_quotes.quote: Once you trust in yourself, you automatically want to go outside of yourself
en_quotes.author: Jeff Koons

en_quotes.quote: You've just got to believe in and trust everyone in your team, and no doubt they will, too
en_quotes.author: Ashleigh Barty

en_quotes.quote: The slogan was 'Don't trust anyone over thirty'. Sixty years later the slogan became, 'Don't trust anyone over ninety'
en_quotes.author: John McCarthy

en_quotes.quote: Trust no friend without faults, and love a woman, but no angel
en_quotes.author: Doris Lessing

en_quotes.quote: Learning to trust is one of life's most difficult tasks
en_quotes.author: Isaac Watts

en_quotes.quote: In every tyrant's heart there springs in the end this poison, that he cannot trust a friend
en_quotes.author: Aeschylus

en_quotes.quote: You must trust and believe in people or life becomes impossible
en_quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes you don't know who you can and cannot trust. I still learn that over and over again
en_quotes.author: Demi Lovato

en_quotes.quote: As president, I'm committed to making Washington work better and rebuilding the trust of the people who sent us here
en_quotes.author: Barack Obama

en_quotes.quote: Trust in God - she will provide
en_quotes.author: Emmeline Pankhurst

en_quotes.quote: I always have issues with trust
en_quotes.author: Vin Diesel

en_quotes.quote: We grow in time to trust the future for our answers
en_quotes.author: Ruth Benedict

en_quotes.quote: In God I trust, so I'm kept going and kept training to follow my dream
en_quotes.author: Cris Cyborg

en_quotes.quote: When all else fails, trust God
en_quotes.author: David Robinson

en_quotes.quote: In the end, you have to just pull the trigger. Trust the car, trust the brakes, just go
en_quotes.author: Daniel Ricciardo

en_quotes.quote: Trust that little voice in your head that says 'Wouldn't it be interesting if...'; And then do it
en_quotes.author: Duane Michals

en_quotes.quote: We're building a lifelong relationship with people, and every great relationship has to be built on trust
en_quotes.author: Angela Ahrendts

en_quotes.quote: Trust is central to an economy that works
en_quotes.author: Stephen Covey

en_quotes.quote: The 'public' scares me, but people I trust
en_quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

en_quotes.quote: So near is falsehood to truth that a wise man would do well not to trust himself on the narrow edge
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: Trusting our intuition often saves us from disaster
en_quotes.author: Anne Wilson Schaef

en_quotes.quote: Astrology is interesting but not very accurate. It's a science I don't trust very much
en_quotes.author: Varg Vikernes

en_quotes.quote: He that takes truth for his guide, and duty for his end, may safely trust to God's providence to lead him aright
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: You have got to discover you, what you do, and trust it
en_quotes.author: Barbra Streisand

en_quotes.quote: Public trust is essential to public safety
en_quotes.author: Martin O'Malley

en_quotes.quote: I think 'The Sunset Tree' is really the album on which I really learned to trust other musicians, which is so important
en_quotes.author: John Darnielle

en_quotes.quote: Don't ever break someone's trust. Once you do, then nobody wants to do business with you
en_quotes.author: Robert Budi Hartono

en_quotes.quote: A healthy relationship is built on unwavering trust
en_quotes.author: Beau Mirchoff

en_quotes.quote: I don't speak English, so I'll just have to win the trust and confidence of the fans with my performance on the field
en_quotes.author: Masahiro Tanaka

en_quotes.quote: I can trust my friends These people force me to examine myself, encourage me to grow
en_quotes.author: Cher

en_quotes.quote: The best fights don't occur between strangers. They occur between friends who trust each other
en_quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

en_quotes.quote: For somehow this disease inheres in tyranny, never to trust one's friends
en_quotes.author: Aeschylus

en_quotes.quote: I want someone who can trust that my big hands are going to take care of them
en_quotes.author: Dwayne Johnson

en_quotes.quote: One must be fond of people and trust them if one is not to make a mess of life
en_quotes.author: E. M. Forster

en_quotes.quote: I don't trust liberals, I trust conservatives
en_quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

en_quotes.quote: If women believed in their husbands they would be a good deal happier and also a good deal more foolish
en_quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

en_quotes.quote: Responsibilities are given to him on whom trust rests. Responsibility is always a sign of trust
en_quotes.author: James Cash Penney

en_quotes.quote: Strange bonds of trust and self-deception tend to grow between journalists and their subjects
en_quotes.author: Sam Harris

en_quotes.quote: I trust myself. You need that to survive
en_quotes.author: Yoko Ono

en_quotes.quote: They that trust in the Lord shall never be confounded!
en_quotes.author: George Muller

en_quotes.quote: Treachery has existed as long as there's been warfare, and there's always been a few people that you couldn't trust
en_quotes.author: Jim Mattis

en_quotes.quote: As life has a way of unfolding as it is meant to, I have learned to trust life
en_quotes.author: Linda Thompson

en_quotes.quote: I believe fundamental honesty is the keystone of business
en_quotes.author: Harvey S. Firestone

en_quotes.quote: Trust is not something that's given because you win an election; it's something you have to earn
en_quotes.author: Tom Perez

en_quotes.quote: To some extent I happily don't know what I'm doing. I feel that it's an artist's responsibility to trust that
en_quotes.author: David Byrne

en_quotes.quote: We are all selfish and I no more trust myself than others with a good motive
en_quotes.author: Lord Byron

en_quotes.quote: I love that we can trust Barack to do what he says he's going to do, even when it's hard - especially when it's hard
en_quotes.author: Michelle Obama

en_quotes.quote: Trust me: I've been travelling, making movies, and spending the remainder of my time at home
en_quotes.author: Kajal Aggarwal

en_quotes.quote: We can only have true public safety with public trust
en_quotes.author: Betsy Hodges

en_quotes.quote: Mike Brown wasn't about race relations, nor Trayvon Martin or even Hurricane Katrina for that matter. It's about trust
en_quotes.author: Kenny Smith

en_quotes.quote: The fruits of your labors may be reaped two generations from now. Trust, even when you don't see the results
en_quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

en_quotes.quote: I feel good because I believe I have made progress in rebuilding the people's trust in their government
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: Trust dies but mistrust blossoms
en_quotes.author: Sophocles

en_quotes.quote: Love is unknown. To open the heart in trust is unknown. They say love hurts. It doesn't have to
en_quotes.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

en_quotes.quote: Trust not too much to appearances
en_quotes.author: Virgil

en_quotes.quote: A half truth, like half a brick, is always more forcible as an argument than a whole one. It carries better
en_quotes.author: Stephen Leacock

en_quotes.quote: I learned you can't trust the judgment of good friends
en_quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

en_quotes.quote: Trust and belief are two prime considerations. You must not allow yourself to be opinionated
en_quotes.author: James Dean

en_quotes.quote: Only trust thyself, and another shall not betray thee
en_quotes.author: William Penn

en_quotes.quote: My parents worry all the time because I trust people very easily
en_quotes.author: Deepika Padukone

en_quotes.quote: Trust not yourself, but your defects to know, make use of every friend and every foe
en_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

en_quotes.quote: Interior design is a business of trust
en_quotes.author: Venus Williams

en_quotes.quote: Trust is a product of test over time
en_quotes.author: Myles Munroe

en_quotes.quote: I like to see honesty out of people. People who are trustworthy. I like to see people who are involved with The Lord
en_quotes.author: Ray Lewis

en_quotes.quote: Every year in my life, I trust fewer and fewer people
en_quotes.author: Francis Chan

en_quotes.quote: It's a delight to trust somebody so completely
en_quotes.author: Jeff Goldblum

en_quotes.quote: Beware of anyone who says they know. Trust me, they don't, or they wouldn't have to say they did
en_quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

en_quotes.quote: How I work is I work from of very character-driven place. And I trust the writers
en_quotes.author: Amy Adams

en_quotes.quote: Don't trust everyone, especially if they say, 'Trust me.'
en_quotes.author: Michelle Phan

en_quotes.quote: The best proof of love is trust
en_quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

en_quotes.quote: When your child believes you really respect what he's feeling, he'll be much more likely to trust you
en_quotes.author: Rachel Simmons

en_quotes.quote: Love and trust and justice, concern for the poor, that's being pushed to the margins, and you can see it
en_quotes.author: Cornel West

en_quotes.quote: Trust is the first step to love
en_quotes.author: Munshi Premchand

en_quotes.quote: The real cost of corruption in government, whether it is local, state, or federal, is a loss of the public trust
en_quotes.author: Mike Quigley

en_quotes.quote: The chief internal enemies of any state are those public officials who betray the trust imposed upon them by the people
en_quotes.author: Dalton Trumbo

en_quotes.quote: We are committed to re-earning your trust
en_quotes.author: Oscar Munoz

en_quotes.quote: The only way to make a man trustworthy is to trust him
en_quotes.author: Henry L. Stimson

en_quotes.quote: I would rather trust a woman's instinct than a man's reason
en_quotes.author: Stanley Baldwin

en_quotes.quote: Faith is not belief without proof, but trust without reservation
en_quotes.author: D. Elton Trueblood

en_quotes.quote: I overthink decisions when I should really trust my heart
en_quotes.author: Brian Littrell

en_quotes.quote: In any solid, good relationship, it takes a while to trust someone
en_quotes.author: Minka Kelly

en_quotes.quote: Trust me, you know when you've got depression
en_quotes.author: Giles Andreae

en_quotes.quote: I think about trust and confidence as something that you earn every day, and we will keep at it, earning it every day
en_quotes.author: Lynn Good

en_quotes.quote: You can't trust code that you did not totally create yourself
en_quotes.author: Ken Thompson

en_quotes.quote: Public trust is a vital condition for artificial intelligence to be used productively
en_quotes.author: Mark Walport

en_quotes.quote: Without trust, you have nothing: trust is so important to me
en_quotes.author: Tamara Ecclestone

en_quotes.quote: Not to be negative, but I think the biggest lesson is don't trust anyone
en_quotes.author: Jeff Baena

en_quotes.quote: We all have a hidden mystic quality if we can learn and trust to tap into that power
en_quotes.author: Cindy Wilson

en_quotes.quote: I completely trust Gloria Vanderbilt. I have always found her very honest
en_quotes.author: Michael Lindsay-Hogg

en_quotes.quote: Trust me that as I ignore all law to help the slave, so will I ignore it all to protect an enslaved woman
en_quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

en_quotes.quote: Trust should be the basis for all our moral training
en_quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

en_quotes.quote: To restore the trust of the people, we must reform the way the government operates
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: My working and personal relationship with President Obama is marked by growing trust. I appreciate this
en_quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

en_quotes.quote: Ah! yes, I know: those who see me rarely trust my word: I must look too intelligent to keep it
en_quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

en_quotes.quote: Trust one who has tried
en_quotes.author: Virgil

en_quotes.quote: One of Rent the Runway's core values is 'Trust in Everyone's Best of Intentions.' We trust our team
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Hyman

en_quotes.quote: Men trust their ears less than their eyes
en_quotes.author: Herodotus

en_quotes.quote: Never trust a husband too far, nor a bachelor too near
en_quotes.author: Helen Rowland

en_quotes.quote: Trust is very hard if you don't know what you're trusting
en_quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

en_quotes.quote: I've spent years trying to time up my drops with my throws. You learn to listen to your feet and trust your positions
en_quotes.author: Aaron Rodgers

en_quotes.quote: The true and solid peace of nations consists not in equality of arms, but in mutual trust alone
en_quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

en_quotes.quote: I trust Canadians' capacity to determine who will sit in their Parliament
en_quotes.author: Justin Trudeau

en_quotes.quote: I don't trust nobody
en_quotes.author: YG

en_quotes.quote: In these times, God's people must trust him for rest of body and soul
en_quotes.author: David Wilkerson

en_quotes.quote: It is impossible to go through life without trust: that is to be imprisoned in the worst cell of all, oneself
en_quotes.author: Graham Greene

en_quotes.quote: One of the reasons I don't trust the media is you can't have a double standard for guys you like and dislike
en_quotes.author: Charles Barkley

en_quotes.quote: If I had chosen the populist course, it would have been a breach of the trust placed in me by the people
en_quotes.author: Narendra Modi

en_quotes.quote: Don't trust the heart, it wants your blood
en_quotes.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

en_quotes.quote: I talk to God every single day. And I say, 'God, my life is in your hands, and I trust you with me.'
en_quotes.author: Tammy Faye Bakker

en_quotes.quote: The sad pattern of lack of trust in God has persisted since the Creation
en_quotes.author: Henry B. Eyring

en_quotes.quote: Trust your hunches. They're usually based on facts filed away just below the conscious level
en_quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

en_quotes.quote: Never trust anyone who wants what you've got. Friend or no, envy is an overwhelming emotion
en_quotes.author: Eubie Blake

en_quotes.quote: Doing designs on a loom takes a lot of talent and experience, and, trust me, I won't be able to do that
en_quotes.author: Liya Kebede

en_quotes.quote: Trust everybody, but cut the cards
en_quotes.author: Finley Peter Dunne

en_quotes.quote: Trust me, I play the game for the fans, my family and myself
en_quotes.author: David Ortiz

en_quotes.quote: The trust of the people in the leaders reflects the confidence of the leaders in the people
en_quotes.author: Paulo Freire

en_quotes.quote: I want my clients to trust me
en_quotes.author: Brad Goreski

en_quotes.quote: People trust me because I've had success
en_quotes.author: DJ Snake

en_quotes.quote: How can people trust the harvest, unless they see it sown?
en_quotes.author: Mary Renault

en_quotes.quote: It is important that we win back the trust of employees first, then customers
en_quotes.author: Oscar Munoz

en_quotes.quote: I don't trust anybody in my life except my mother and my dogs
en_quotes.author: Cheryl Cole

en_quotes.quote: Fanatics do not have faith - they have belief. With faith you let go. You trust. Whereas with belief you cling
en_quotes.author: Yann Martel

en_quotes.quote: Trust leads to approachability and open communications
en_quotes.author: Scott Weiss

en_quotes.quote: I'm not keen on the Internet. I don't trust it
en_quotes.author: Amanda Eliasch

en_quotes.quote: Trust your instincts and emotions
en_quotes.author: Angela Ahrendts

en_quotes.quote: I've got 'trust' tattooed on me, and I have a tattoo on my finger that's for my parents
en_quotes.author: Anne-Marie

en_quotes.quote: My bank account has let me know that I'm a homeowner. Trust me
en_quotes.author: Michael Ealy

en_quotes.quote: Sport is one of the few spaces where people can learn about different cultures in a spirit of trust and friendship
en_quotes.author: Richard Attias

en_quotes.quote: The moment for action has arrived, and I know that I can trust in you to save our country
en_quotes.author: George B. McClellan

en_quotes.quote: One is only susceptible to lobbying if they're weak and they trust what an individual tells them without verification
en_quotes.author: Richard Burr

en_quotes.quote: Maybe if I really believe in me, trust me without any calculated plan, who knows what will happen?
en_quotes.author: Eva Hesse

en_quotes.quote: Even now I can't trust life. It did too many awful things to me as a kid
en_quotes.author: Clara Bow

en_quotes.quote: Put not your trust in money, but put your money in trust
en_quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

en_quotes.quote: It takes people a while to trust you
en_quotes.author: Karl Malone

en_quotes.quote: Those trying to get support for their iPhones don't necessary trust their carriers, so they ask their friends for help
en_quotes.author: Parker Harris

en_quotes.quote: Trust your instincts, and the best way to trust them is to practice them
en_quotes.author: Vincent Rodriguez III

en_quotes.quote: Trust me - he will be back. I promise you, at some point CM Punk will be back involved in wrestling
en_quotes.author: Sean Waltman

en_quotes.quote: You have to trust your body to take care of you
en_quotes.author: A. J. Langer

en_quotes.quote: Strong communities are built around local, real food. Food we trust to nourish our bodies, the farmer and planet
en_quotes.author: Kimbal Musk

en_quotes.quote: My trust in a higher power that wants me to survive and have love in my life, is what keeps me moving forward
en_quotes.author: Kenny Loggins

en_quotes.quote: I don't trust squirrels
en_quotes.author: Terry Rozier

en_quotes.quote: I just wanted to work, build a relationship with my teammates, and earn their trust
en_quotes.author: Eric Weddle

en_quotes.quote: Hire women. Trust women. Let them succeed. They are a pleasure to work with
en_quotes.author: Catherine Reitman

en_quotes.quote: My workers are efficient - instead of trusting those backstabbing, trust those who work honestly
en_quotes.author: H. D. Kumaraswamy

en_quotes.quote: Keeping it simple, 'Bounce Back' explains my trust issues. I'm sure everyone can relate in some way
en_quotes.author: Kodie Shane

en_quotes.quote: The essence of good government is trust
en_quotes.author: Kathleen Sebelius

en_quotes.quote: Trust is the conduit for influence; it's the medium through which ideas travel
en_quotes.author: Amy Cuddy

en_quotes.quote: My parents put everything in a trust fund for me. I won't get it until I'm 18, so I'll use it for college
en_quotes.author: Heather O'Rourke

en_quotes.quote: I believe that my greatest strength is a deep-rooted, unshakeable trust to never let myself give up
en_quotes.author: Alexander Dreymon

en_quotes.quote: I look for people who're passionate, dedicated to the text, and in whom I trust completely
en_quotes.author: Greta Scacchi

en_quotes.quote: We realized that the only persons we can truly trust in this world is each other and our families
en_quotes.author: Marion Jones

en_quotes.quote: If you don't like Beyonce, then it's hard for me to trust you. It's like not liking world peace
en_quotes.author: Seinabo Sey

en_quotes.quote: Trust is everything. If I didn't have trust, there would be no downloads, no show, and no business
en_quotes.author: Stefan Molyneux

en_quotes.quote: All you can do is trust, be open and prepared, and you have to be flexible, as much as possible
en_quotes.author: Max Riemelt

en_quotes.quote: The Supreme Court's only armor is the cloak of public trust; its sole ammunition, the collective hopes of our society
en_quotes.author: Irving R. Kaufman

en_quotes.quote: We need self-confidence in our ability to build Africa. I trust in Mali and I trust in music
en_quotes.author: Rokia Traore

en_quotes.quote: We have only God on our side; they have 'In God We Trust' on their side
en_quotes.author: Willie Green

en_quotes.quote: I don't like Bush. I don't trust him. I don't like his record. He's stupid. He's lazy
en_quotes.author: Cher

en_quotes.quote: They say I'm the Hottest MC in the Game. If you label me that, I will live up to it. Trust me
en_quotes.author: Lil Wayne

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes the hardest thing to do is to trust your team. It's a lesson I've had to relearn quite a few times
en_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: If you're not gonna do it right off the field, who's to say we trust you on the field?
en_quotes.author: Baker Mayfield

en_quotes.quote: People don't trust private health insurance companies for all the right reasons
en_quotes.author: Bernie Sanders

en_quotes.quote: I will work my heart out to earn the trust of the people of Massachusetts
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Warren

en_quotes.quote: A dermatologist you trust is your greatest weapon
en_quotes.author: Hannah Bronfman

en_quotes.quote: All in all, I just don't trust journalists - and I don't think it's a good practice for me to trust journalists
en_quotes.author: Frank Ocean

en_quotes.quote: I will have to earn trust and respect from my kids
en_quotes.author: Tiger Woods

en_quotes.quote: We can trust ourselves to know when our boundaries are being violated
en_quotes.author: Melody Beattie

en_quotes.quote: I buy about $1,500 worth of papers every month. Not that I trust them. I'm looking for the crack in the fabric
en_quotes.author: Dick Gregory

en_quotes.quote: You cannot have a relationship with someone you can't trust
en_quotes.author: Sheri L. Dew

en_quotes.quote: For every good reason there is to lie, there is a better reason to tell the truth
en_quotes.author: Bo Bennett

en_quotes.quote: I don't listen to people's opinions. I have people around me who I can trust, but most of all I listen to myself
en_quotes.author: Mary J. Blige

en_quotes.quote: If the players don't trust the coach, it is a problem, and vice versa
en_quotes.author: Bill Parcells

en_quotes.quote: I just want to contribute to my team and earn the trust and do everything they need from me
en_quotes.author: Stefon Diggs

en_quotes.quote: Trust is the lubrication that makes it possible for organizations to work
en_quotes.author: Warren Bennis

en_quotes.quote: Donald Trump I wouldn't trust as far as I could throw him
en_quotes.author: Mark Cuban

en_quotes.quote: I believe in trusting men, not only once but twice - in giving a failure another chance
en_quotes.author: James Cash Penney

en_quotes.quote: I never trust an executive who tends to pass the buck. Nor would I want to deal with him as a customer or a supplier
en_quotes.author: James Cash Penney

en_quotes.quote: Raising five boys is a handful, trust me
en_quotes.author: Barbara Bush

en_quotes.quote: Trust your gut
en_quotes.author: Sara Blakely

en_quotes.quote: Businesses and users are going to use technology only if they can trust it
en_quotes.author: Satya Nadella

en_quotes.quote: You can't trust anybody with power
en_quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

en_quotes.quote: I don't trust a lot of journalists
en_quotes.author: Calvin Klein

en_quotes.quote: When truth takes a backseat to ego and politics, trust is lost
en_quotes.author: Patrick Lencioni

en_quotes.quote: Employees who can't trust their leader to be vulnerable are not going to be vulnerable and build trust with one another
en_quotes.author: Patrick Lencioni

en_quotes.quote: Without trust, the most essential element of innovation - conflict - becomes impossible
en_quotes.author: Patrick Lencioni

en_quotes.quote: Counterintuitive actions prove we can trust real knowledge and do the opposite of what we feel makes sense
en_quotes.author: Penn Jillette

en_quotes.quote: Every time I make American film I just trust American directors and American writers
en_quotes.author: Jackie Chan

en_quotes.quote: I'm not a comic. There's twenty five percent of me that doesn't trust people who identify as comics
en_quotes.author: Katya Zamolodchikova

en_quotes.quote: I'm going to trust my instincts when something's wrong
en_quotes.author: Katarina Johnson-Thompson

en_quotes.quote: You can't trust an artist that just makes good records
en_quotes.author: Nick Cave

en_quotes.quote: You can never trust what you read
en_quotes.author: William Goldman

en_quotes.quote: Trust me: I do hit the snooze button about 4 times
en_quotes.author: Tamron Hall

en_quotes.quote: We need, in effect, to make the phantom 'lock-boxes' around the trust fund real
en_quotes.author: Alan Greenspan

en_quotes.quote: I'm so suspicious of boys-slash-men. I just don't like them or trust them
en_quotes.author: Megan Fox

en_quotes.quote: I'm learning to trust other people to do things. My time is limited, and I'd rather be spending it with my kids
en_quotes.author: Kourtney Kardashian

en_quotes.quote: Where large sums of money are concerned, it is advisable to trust nobody
en_quotes.author: Agatha Christie

en_quotes.quote: If you're not certain about something, it might mean you should reach out to a person you trust for advice
en_quotes.author: Caroline Ghosn

en_quotes.quote: Whatever happens in life is fine - just trust in that
en_quotes.author: Orlando Bloom

en_quotes.quote: If you don't trust someone to look after your investments, then they shouldn't be doing the job for you
en_quotes.author: Murray Walker

en_quotes.quote: I value an entrepreneur I can get behind and trust, because I know they are attempting to move forward in life
en_quotes.author: Daymond John

en_quotes.quote: Having a team that I trust is, for me, really important
en_quotes.author: Angelique Kerber

en_quotes.quote: I read the NY Times but I don't trust all of it
en_quotes.author: David Byrne

en_quotes.quote: A lot of why I climb is for the friendship, the loyalty and trust, the shared experience of being in that moment
en_quotes.author: Jimmy Chin

en_quotes.quote: Bill Morneau has betrayed the trust of Canadians over and over
en_quotes.author: Andrew Scheer

en_quotes.quote: It doesn't make any sense... that's why I trust it!
en_quotes.author: Kate Winslet

en_quotes.quote: Trust me, I do not have an online strategy
en_quotes.author: Lewis Capaldi

en_quotes.quote: You cannot do everything at once, so find people you trust to help you. And don't be afraid to say no
en_quotes.author: Jane Seymour

en_quotes.quote: I always trust my gut reaction; it's always right
en_quotes.author: Kiana Tom

en_quotes.quote: If we really want to be full and generous in spirit, we have no choice but to trust at some level
en_quotes.author: Rita Dove

en_quotes.quote: People don't trust government, they don't trust Wall Street, they don't trust the church, they don't trust the media
en_quotes.author: Donna Brazile

en_quotes.quote: I've learned to trust myself, to listen to truth, to not be afraid of it and to not try and hide it
en_quotes.author: Sarah McLachlan

en_quotes.quote: Do not trust the cheering, for those persons would shout as much if you or I were going to be hanged
en_quotes.author: Oliver Cromwell

en_quotes.quote: Few delights can equal the presence of one whom we trust utterly
en_quotes.author: George MacDonald

en_quotes.quote: It can be hard in this business, especially when you're very young, to figure out who you can and can't trust
en_quotes.author: Christina Aguilera

en_quotes.quote: Trust your ability!
en_quotes.author: Itzhak Perlman

en_quotes.quote: The key to high-quality communication is trust, and it's hard to trust somebody that you don't know
en_quotes.author: Ben Horowitz

en_quotes.quote: I've only ever trusted my gut on everything. I don't trust my head, I don't trust my heart, I trust my gut
en_quotes.author: Bryan Adams

en_quotes.quote: Do not trust people. They are capable of greatness
en_quotes.author: Stanislaw Lem

en_quotes.quote: I don't trust anyone except a very, very few people
en_quotes.author: Alex Rodriguez

en_quotes.quote: Not everyone can be trusted. I think we all have to be very selective about the people we trust
en_quotes.author: Shelley Long

en_quotes.quote: The hardest thing to do is to trust people
en_quotes.author: Dwight Howard

en_quotes.quote: I never trusted good-looking boys
en_quotes.author: Frances McDormand

en_quotes.quote: I will rebuild the people's trust in government and create a stable foundation for Taiwan's future development
en_quotes.author: Tsai Ing-wen

en_quotes.quote: Never trust sheep
en_quotes.author: Ryan Stiles

en_quotes.quote: Don't trust anyone over 30
en_quotes.author: Pat Boone

en_quotes.quote: Well, you can't trust most people in this game, period; it can be a very shady business
en_quotes.author: Marvin Hagler

en_quotes.quote: The history of the intelligence community is replete with violations of the trust of the American people
en_quotes.author: James Clapper

en_quotes.quote: Would you want to do business with a person who was 99% honest?
en_quotes.author: Sydney Madwed

en_quotes.quote: When trust improves, the mood improves
en_quotes.author: Fernando Flores

en_quotes.quote: None of us and none of the Arabs trust Israel
en_quotes.author: Bashar al-Assad

en_quotes.quote: Trust him not with your secrets, who, when left alone in your room, turns over your papers
en_quotes.author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

en_quotes.quote: The great thing about marriage is that it creates trust, the most precious of things
en_quotes.author: Theodore Zeldin

en_quotes.quote: You see that's what I think is such a terrible, terrible betrayal, the trust that people have in government
en_quotes.author: Ralph Steadman

en_quotes.quote: For me, love is magic; it's about trust and understanding. It's putting the other person before you effortlessly
en_quotes.author: Aditi Rao Hydari

en_quotes.quote: A man who trusts nobody is apt to be the kind of man nobody trusts
en_quotes.author: Harold MacMillan

en_quotes.quote: I trust the flow of life
en_quotes.author: Marketa Irglova

en_quotes.quote: Put the right people in the right places, and then you trust them to do the right stuff
en_quotes.author: Dara Khosrowshahi

en_quotes.quote: My motto is 'In Tina Fey I trust.'
en_quotes.author: Jane Krakowski

en_quotes.quote: Trust yourself and don't do anything that doesn't feel right
en_quotes.author: Melanie Scrofano

en_quotes.quote: Better to trust the man who is frequently in error than the one who is never in doubt
en_quotes.author: Eric Sevareid

en_quotes.quote: Conversation without you trying to be sexy can still come off as very sexy. Trust me!
en_quotes.author: Sevyn Streeter

en_quotes.quote: I have to trust what I do and then do it
en_quotes.author: Ednita Nazario

en_quotes.quote: The only way to move forward is to be able to trust whomever you're with 100 percent
en_quotes.author: Melissa McBride

en_quotes.quote: Trust in yourself. Your perceptions are often far more accurate than you are willing to believe
en_quotes.author: Claudia Black

en_quotes.quote: Put your trust in the Lord and go ahead. Worry gets you no place
en_quotes.author: Roy Acuff

en_quotes.quote: Trust is a great force multiplier
en_quotes.author: Tom Ridge

en_quotes.quote: At the end of the day, I only trust my family
en_quotes.author: Ali Lohan

en_quotes.quote: Who would not rather trust and be deceived?
en_quotes.author: Eliza Cook
